vote.title: Glasajte za nastavak korištenja besplatne umjetne inteligencije

description.1: Ai {command} generacija ne raste na drveću! Podržite nas [brzim glasovanjem na top.gg]({url}), to omogućuje ljudima da lakše pronađu {name}, hvala vam na podršci!
description.2: Glasovanje za mene omogućit će vam pristup generiranju koliko god želite AI slika u sljedećih 12 sati!

description.1: I have detected possible illegal content in your query, please refrain from using it.
description.2: If you think this is a mistake, please report it on our [support server]({url}), thank you.

better_query.title: Know your model and improve queries

description.1: The image improves as you provide more and better details in the query, note that overwriting the negative query will remove the preset.
description.2: You should [find the usage guidelines]({url}) for your model to get better results.
description.3: Note that not every model is good for everything, some models are trained on anime and some other on realistic images.
description.4: Yes, I can generate NSFW content, but you can only use it inside of [NSFW marked channels]({url}).

better_query.footer: This message is only shown once

description.1: The model you selected does not exist, please use the autocomplete options.
description.2: If this continues to happen, please ask in our [support server]({url}), thank you.

error.title: There was an error while generating

description.2: If you think this is a bug, please report it on our [support server]({url}), we're sorry.

nsfw_query: You tried some naughty stuff in the query.. Switch to or create an NSFW marked channel to use such!
